channel.title: Land Quality on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Land Quality on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Soil and Land Quality Surveys
item.description:
What you can do

  • Plan sampling grids and record field logs
  • Capture depths, horizons, and conditions
  • Attach photos and sync to QFieldCloud
